Name: oid
column6: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: conname
column6: constraint name (not necessarily unique!)

Name: connamespace
column6: the oid of the namespace that contains this constraint

Name: contype
column6: c = check constraint, f = foreign key constraint, p = primary key constraint, u = unique constraint, t = constraint trigger, x = exclusion constraint

Name: condeferrable
column6: is the constraint deferrable?

Name: condeferred
column6: is the constraint deferred by default?

Name: convalidated
column6: has the constraint been validated? currently, can only be false for foreign keys and check constraints

Name: conrelid
column6: the table this constraint is on; 0 if not a table constraint

Name: contypid
column6: the domain this constraint is on; 0 if not a domain constraint

Name: conindid
column6: the index supporting this constraint, if it's a unique, primary key, foreign key, or exclusion constraint; else 0

Name: conparentid
column6: the corresponding constraint in the parent partitioned table, if this is a constraint in a partition; else 0

Name: confrelid
column6: if a foreign key, the referenced table; else 0

Name: confupdtype
column6: foreign key update action code: a = no action, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confdeltype
column6: foreign key deletion action code: a = no action, r = restrict, c = cascade, n = set null, d = set default

Name: confmatchtype
column6: foreign key match type: f = full, p = partial, s = simple

Name: conislocal
column6: this constraint is defined locally for the relation. note that a constraint can be locally defined and inherited simultaneously.

Name: coninhcount
column6: the number of direct inheritance ancestors this constraint has. a constraint with a nonzero number of ancestors cannot be dropped nor renamed.

Name: connoinherit
column6: this constraint is defined locally for the relation. it is a non-inheritable constraint.

Name: conkey
column6: if a table constraint (including foreign keys, but not constraint triggers), list of the constrained columns

Name: confkey
column6: if a foreign key, list of the referenced columns

Name: conpfeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = fk comparisons

Name: conppeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for pk = pk comparisons

Name: conffeqop
column6: if a foreign key, list of the equality operators for fk = fk comparisons

Name: conexclop
column6: if an exclusion constraint, list of the per-column exclusion operators

Name: conbin
column6: if a check constraint, an internal representation of the expression

Name: consrc
column6: if a check constraint, a human-readable representation of the expression
